author: jochembrouwer
content: Tbh, I am still in the dark why this did not trigger the bug; https://github.com/ethereum/tests/pull/811 IIRC this test was generated because Besu also had the bug where BLS was not removed from the active precompiles, which triggered this expansion of the test suite. But sadly I cannot find back the message which actually stated this is the case, so might be some foggy memory. I am still in the dark why this did not find this bug in OE - but maybe I am missing something obvious here.

author: lightclient
content: IIUC the test suite / fuzzers were run with configs for OE that did not include BLS builtin, but the OE release included a config with BLS but it was disabled - the 2929 code that added the precompiles didn't differentiate between enabled and disabled builtins, so the BLS addresses were included
